Hi, my iPhone 13 has the following problem:
Where is my phone?
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

Your satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear Ecomobile,

complete address:

Vitalba Li bassi
Viale degli Elimi 36
91013 Sasi (TP)

Phone: 333 915 6671

Thank you for wanting to confirm the address, the house number was missing.

Best regards,
Andreia, from Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing the customer's address, your assistance is greatly appreciated. The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number 1ZBF1560D901163096. Here is the tracking link:
https://www.ups.com/track?loc=it_it&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901163096/trackdetails

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
